description: Informe trimestral de impuestos retenidos sobre intereses, dividendos o pagos profesionales

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(je.debit) AS total
FROM 
    `tabGL Entry` je
WHERE 
    je.docstatus = 1
    AND je.voucher_type = 'Payment Entry'
    AND je.company = %(company)s
    AND je.account 
    AND je.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
model_values.value_description: Pagos totales sujetos a retención

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(je.credit) AS total     
FROM 
    `tabGL Entry` je
WHERE 
    je.docstatus = 1
    AND je.company = %(company)s
    AND je.account IN(  
    SELECT name
        FROM `tabAccount`
        WHERE parent_account = (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE account_number = "477" AND company = %(company)s
        )) 
    AND je.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
model_values.value_description: Total de retención en origen aplicada

name: Modelo 123

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(pi.base_net_total) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` AS pi
INNER JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` AS ptc
    ON pi.name = ptc.parent
WHERE 
    pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s
    AND ptc.rate = "19"
    AND ptc.account_head IN (
        SELECT name
        FROM `tabAccount`
        WHERE parent_account = (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE account_number = "4751" AND company = %(company)s
        )
    );
model_values.value_description: Alquiler total sujeto a retención en origen

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(pi.grand_total) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` AS pi
INNER JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` AS ptc
    ON pi.name = ptc.parent
WHERE 
    pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s
    AND ptc.rate = "19"
    AND ptc.account_head IN (
        SELECT name
        FROM `tabAccount`
        WHERE parent_account = (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE account_number = "4751" AND company = %(company)s
        )
    );
model_values.value_description: Alquiler total pagado

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(ptc.tax_amount) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` AS pi
INNER JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` AS ptc
    ON pi.name = ptc.parent
WHERE 
    pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s
    AND ptc.rate = "19"
    AND ptc.account_head IN (
        SELECT name
        FROM `tabAccount`
        WHERE parent_account = (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE account_number = "4751" AND company = %(company)s
        )
    );
model_values.value_description: Retención total del IRPF

description: Declaración trimestral de retenciones a cuenta del IRPF sobre pagos.

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT a.name AS account
FROM tabAccount AS a
JOIN tabAccount AS p ON a.parent_account = p.name
WHERE p.account_number = 4751 AND p.company = %(company)s
AND a.custom_es_cuenta_de_empleado = 0
AND a.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Número total de proveedores con retención del IRPF

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT a.name AS account
FROM tabAccount AS a
JOIN tabAccount AS p ON a.parent_account = p.name
WHERE p.account_number = 4751  AND p.company = %(company)s
AND a.custom_es_cuenta_de_empleado = 1
AND a.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Número total de empleados con retención del IRPF

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT a.name AS account
FROM tabAccount AS a
JOIN tabAccount AS p ON a.parent_account = p.name
WHERE p.account_number = 4751  AND p.company = %(company)s
AND a.custom_es_cuenta_de_empleado = 0
AND a.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Importe total del IRPF retenido a proveedores

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT a.name AS account
FROM tabAccount AS a
JOIN tabAccount AS p ON a.parent_account = p.name
WHERE p.account_number = 4751 AND p.company = %(company)s
AND a.custom_es_cuenta_de_empleado = 1
AND a.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Importe total del IRPF retenido a los empleados

name: Modelo 111

description: Declaración de IVA (IVA) para presentación trimestral

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(si.grand_total) AS total
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` AS si
WHERE 
    si.name IN (
        SELECT DISTINCT stc.parent
        FROM `tabSales Taxes and Charges` AS stc
        WHERE stc.account_head IN (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE parent_account = (
                SELECT name 
                FROM `tabAccount`
                WHERE account_number = "477" AND company = %(company)s
            )
        )
    )
    AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Monto Total de Ventas Sujeto a IVA

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(ptc.tax_amount) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` AS pi
INNER JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` AS ptc
    ON pi.name = ptc.parent
WHERE 
    pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s
    AND ptc.account_head IN (
        SELECT name
        FROM `tabAccount`
        WHERE parent_account = (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE account_number = "472" AND company = %(company)s
        )
    );
model_values.value_description: Total IVA pagado en compras

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(stc.tax_amount) AS total
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` AS si
INNER JOIN 
    `tabSales Taxes and Charges` AS stc
    ON si.name = stc.parent
WHERE 
    si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s
    AND stc.account_head IN (
        SELECT name
        FROM `tabAccount`
        WHERE parent_account = (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE account_number = "477" AND company = %(company)s
        )
    );
model_values.value_description: Total IVA recaudado sobre las ventas

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT
    (
        (SELECT 
    SUM(stc.tax_amount) AS total
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` AS si
INNER JOIN 
    `tabSales Taxes and Charges` AS stc
    ON si.name = stc.parent
WHERE 
    si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s
    AND stc.account_head IN (
        SELECT name
        FROM `tabAccount`
        WHERE parent_account = (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE account_number = "477" AND company = %(company)s
        )
    )


        )
        -
        (SELECT 
    SUM(ptc.tax_amount) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` AS pi
INNER JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` AS ptc
    ON pi.name = ptc.parent
WHERE 
    pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s
    AND ptc.account_head IN (
        SELECT name
        FROM `tabAccount`
        WHERE parent_account = (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE account_number = "472" AND company = %(company)s
        )
    )



        )
    ) AS total;
model_values.value_description: IVA Neto a Pagar (IVA Recaudado - IVA Pagado)

name: Modelo 303

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT si.customer) AS total
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` si
WHERE 
    si.name IN (
        SELECT DISTINCT stc.parent
        FROM `tabSales Taxes and Charges` AS stc
        WHERE stc.account_head IN (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE parent_account = (
                SELECT name 
                FROM `tabAccount`
                WHERE account_number = '477' 
                  AND company = %(company)s
            )
        )
    )
    AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s
GROUP BY 
    si.customer
HAVING 
    SUM(si.grand_total) > 3005.06;
model_values.value_description: Clientes totales

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(si.grand_total) AS total
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` si
WHERE 
    si.customer IN (
        SELECT 
            si.customer
        FROM 
            `tabSales Invoice` si
        WHERE 
            si.name IN (
                SELECT DISTINCT stc.parent
                FROM `tabSales Taxes and Charges` AS stc
                WHERE stc.account_head IN (
                    SELECT name
                    FROM `tabAccount`
                    WHERE parent_account = (
                        SELECT name 
                        FROM `tabAccount`
                        WHERE account_number = '477' 
                          AND company = %(company)s
                    )
                )
            )
            AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
            AND si.company = %(company)s
        GROUP BY 
            si.customer
        HAVING 
            SUM(si.grand_total) > 3005.06
    )
    AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Ventas totales a clientes

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT pi.supplier) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi
WHERE 
    pi.name IN (
        SELECT DISTINCT stc.parent
        FROM `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` AS stc
        WHERE stc.account_head IN (
            SELECT name
            FROM `tabAccount`
            WHERE parent_account = (
                SELECT name 
                FROM `tabAccount`
                WHERE account_number = '472' 
                  AND company = %(company)s
            )
        )
    )
    AND pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s
GROUP BY 
    pi.supplier
HAVING 
    SUM(pi.grand_total) > 3005.06;
model_values.value_description: Proveedores totales

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
WITH RelevantSuppliers AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT si.supplier
    FROM 
        `tabPurchase Invoice` si
        JOIN `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` stc ON si.name = stc.parent
        JOIN `tabAccount` a1 ON stc.account_head = a1.name
        JOIN `tabAccount` a2 ON a1.parent_account = a2.name
    WHERE 
        a2.account_number = '472' 
        AND a2.company = %(company)s
        AND si.company = %(company)s
        AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    GROUP BY 
        si.supplier
    HAVING 
        SUM(si.grand_total) > 3005.06
)
SELECT 
    SUM(si.grand_total) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` si
    JOIN RelevantSuppliers ON si.supplier = RelevantSuppliers.supplier
    JOIN `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` stc ON si.name = stc.parent
    JOIN `tabAccount` a1 ON stc.account_head = a1.name
    JOIN `tabAccount` a2 ON a1.parent_account = a2.name
WHERE 
    a2.account_number = '472' 
    AND a2.company = %(company)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s
    AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s;
model_values.value_description: Compras totales a proveedores

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(si.base_net_total) AS total
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` si
JOIN 
    `tabSales Taxes and Charges` stc ON si.name = stc.parent
JOIN 
    `tabAddress` a ON si.customer_address = a.name  
WHERE 
    a.country != 'Spain'  
    AND a.country IN ('France', 'Germany', 'Italy', 'Other EU Countries')
    AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Total de bienes suministrados a clientes de la UE

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    IFNULL(SUM(stc.tax_amount), 0) AS total
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` si
JOIN 
    `tabSales Taxes and Charges` stc ON si.name = stc.parent
JOIN 
    `tabAddress` a ON si.customer_address = a.name
WHERE 
    a.country != 'Spain' 
    AND a.country IN ('France', 'Germany', 'Italy', 'Poland', 'Netherlands', 'Belgium', 'Other EU Countries')  
    AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Impuesto retenido sobre suministros de la UE

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(pi.base_net_total) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi
JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` ptc ON pi.name = ptc.parent
JOIN 
    `tabAddress` a ON pi.supplier_address = a.name 
WHERE 
    
    a.country != 'Spain'  
    AND a.country IN ('France', 'Germany', 'Italy', 'Other EU Countries')
    AND pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Total de bienes adquiridos a proveedores de la UE

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    IFNULL(SUM(ptc.tax_amount), 0) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi
JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` ptc ON pi.name = ptc.parent
JOIN 
    `tabAddress` a ON pi.supplier_address = a.name 
WHERE 
    
    a.country != 'Spain'  
    AND a.country IN ('France', 'Germany', 'Italy', 'Other EU Countries')
    AND pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Impuesto retenido sobre compras en la UE

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(si.base_net_total) AS total
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` si
JOIN 
    `tabCustomer` c ON si.customer = c.name
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON si.name = sii.parent
JOIN 
    `tabAddress` a ON si.customer_address = a.name 
WHERE 
    a.country != 'Spain'
    AND a.country IN ('France', 'Germany', 'Italy', 'Other EU Countries')
    AND sii.item_group = 'Services' 
    AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Total de servicios prestados dentro de la UE

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(si.total_taxes_and_charges) AS total
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` si
JOIN 
    `tabCustomer` c ON si.customer = c.name
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON si.name = sii.parent
JOIN 
    `tabAddress` a ON si.customer_address = a.name 
WHERE 
    a.country != 'Spain'
    AND a.country IN ('France', 'Germany', 'Italy', 'Other EU Countries')
    AND sii.item_group = 'Services' 
    AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND si.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Impuesto retenido sobre servicios intracomunitarios

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(pi.base_net_total) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi
JOIN 
    `tabSupplier` s ON pi.supplier = s.name
JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii ON pi.name = pii.parent
JOIN 
    `tabAddress` a ON pi.supplier_address = a.name 
WHERE 
    a.country != 'Spain'
    AND a.country IN ('France', 'Germany', 'Italy', 'Other EU Countries')
    AND pii.item_group = 'Services' 
    AND pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Total de servicios recibidos dentro de la UE

model_values.calculation_rule__query:
SELECT 
    SUM(ABS(pi.total_taxes_and_charges)) AS total
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi
JOIN 
    `tabSupplier` s ON pi.supplier = s.name
JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii ON pi.name = pii.parent
JOIN 
    `tabAddress` a ON pi.supplier_address = a.name 
WHERE 
    a.country != 'Spain'
    AND a.country IN ('France', 'Germany', 'Italy', 'Other EU Countries')
    AND pii.item_group = 'Services' 
    AND pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s
    AND pi.company = %(company)s;
model_values.value_description: Impuesto retenido sobre ingresos intracomunitarios
